description: Plans and subscription management page UI strings for plan selection, cancellation, and reactivation.

resources.title: 套餐与订阅
resources.subtitle: 选择最适合您的套餐
resources.coming_soon: 详细对比表格即将上线...
resources.subscription_activated: 订阅已激活！您的订阅已成功激活。
resources.subscription_cancelled: 订阅已取消。您已取消订阅流程。
resources.plan_changed_to_free: 套餐已更改。您现在使用的是免费套餐。
resources.subscription_will_cancel: 订阅已取消。您的订阅将在当前周期结束时取消。
resources.subscription_reactivated: 订阅已重新激活。您的订阅已成功重新激活。
